subject: Package SSN4248
description_text: Ich habe meine Pedalen erhalten. Leider ist es so, dass für die Platte keine Distanzscheiben und Schrauben dabei waren. Des weiteren waren für die bremsen keine Plastik Distanzringe dabei, wenn man nicht alle Elastomere nimmt. Des weiteren funktioniert die Kalibrierung nicht. Auch zb wenn ich die Kalibrierung mache, erreiche ich danach nie 100 Prozent beim bremsen... immer dsnn nur bis 36kg also 36 Prozent und somit funktioniert es sehr schlecht. Wie können Sie mir dabei helfen und entgegen kommen, ansonsten möchte ich die Pedalen zurück schicken. MfG Jasper Diekmann

conversations.body_text:
Des weiteren ist das erdungskabel ebenfalls nicht dabei Am 14.12.2025 16:45 schrieb service@simsonn.com: 
 
 Hi jasper diekmann We would like to acknowledge that we have received your request and a ticket has been created. A support representative will be reviewing your request and will send you a personal response.(usually within 24 hours). To view the status of the ticket or add comments, please visit https://simsonn.freshdesk.com/helpdesk/tickets/8214?follow=email Thank you for your patience. View ticket If the button doesn't work, copy-paste this URL in your browser's address bar: https://simsonn.freshdesk.com/helpdesk/tickets/8214?follow=email Regards, simsonn Support Team

Subject: Missing parts in my SIMSONN pedal order – Order SSN4248
Hello SIMSONN Support Team,
I’m contacting you regarding my recent pedal order SSN4248. Unfortunately, the delivery is incomplete and several parts are missing. I have attached photos as evidence and referenced the picture numbers below.
In this case, the issue is missing parts, not a functional defect. Therefore, it is unfortunately not possible to demonstrate the problem in a video.
Missing items / issues:

  *
Black spacers are missing, as shown in photo (89).
  *
Spacers and screws for my mounting/plate are missing, visible in photo (88). The spacers and screws currently shown in the photo are my own parts and were not included in your delivery.
  *
The ground wire for the hub/controller is missing, as shown in photo (90).
  *
Due to the number of missing parts, it seems that one entire package may not have been included in the shipment.

Please check my order SSN4248 and arrange a replacement shipment with all missing parts as soon as possible.
If you need any further information, please let me know.
Thank you for your support.
Kind regards,
Jasper Diekmann
Attachments:
Photo 88 – missing spacers & screws
Photo 89 – missing black spacers
Photo 90 – missing ground wire
​​
________________________________

Additional critical issue – hub/controller failure after firmware update In addition to the missing parts, I now have a serious technical problem with the SIMSONN hub/controller: After performing a firmware update, the hub is no longer recognized by Windows Windows reports: “USB device not recognized” The power LED starts blinking The hub becomes very warm / hot, even without pedals or motors connected Pedals and motors are no longer detected I have tested: different USB cables different USB ports a minimal setup (hub + original power supply only) The problem started immediately after the firmware update. Because the hub is overheating, I have stopped using it for safety reasons. This is not a configuration or software issue on my side. The device is currently not usable. --- Request Please check my order SSN4248 and advise on: 1. Replacement shipment for all missing parts 2. Repair or replacement of the hub/controller (RMA), or instructions for firmware recovery if possible I purchased the pedals directly from SIMSONN, not through a reseller. If you need additional information, photos, serial numbers, or logs, please let me know. Thank you for your support and I look forward to your reply. Kind regards, Jasper Diekmann Am 15.12.2025 10:13 schrieb jasper diekmann <jasper.d@hotmail.de>: 1000099589.jpg 1000099588.jpg 1000099590.jpg Subject: Missing parts in my SIMSONN pedal order – Order SSN4248 Hello SIMSONN Support Team, I’m contacting you regarding my recent pedal order SSN4248. Unfortunately, the delivery is incomplete and several parts are missing. I have attached photos as evidence and referenced the picture numbers below. In this case, the issue is missing parts, not a functional defect. Therefore, it is unfortunately not possible to demonstrate the problem in a video. Missing items / issues: Black spacers are missing, as shown in photo (89). Spacers and screws for my mounting/plate are missing, visible in photo (88). The spacers and screws currently shown in the photo are my own parts and were not included in your delivery. The ground wire for the hub/controller is missing, as shown in photo (90). Due to the number of missing parts, it seems that one entire package may not have been included in the shipment. Please check my order SSN4248 and arrange a replacement shipment with all missing parts as soon as possible. If you need any further information, please let me know. Thank you for your support. Kind regards, Jasper Diekmann Attachments: Photo 88 – missing spacers & screws Photo 89 – missing black spacers Photo 90 – missing ground wire

Hi jasper diekmann,    We apologize for the delayed response. Please provide a photo so we can verify with our warehouse and arrange a replacement shipment for you as soon as possible.

Subject: Order SSN4248 – Additional photos + confirmation of missing parts and defective hub (replacement required) Hello SIMSONN Support Team, thank you for your reply. As requested, I am attaching three new photos to clearly show the current delivery contents and confirm the missing parts. Please note that these photos are in addition to the photos I already sent earlier. Missing parts (confirmed) After checking everything again carefully, the following items are missing from the delivery and were not included at all: -Black spacers (required for pedal mounting) -Spacers and screws for the pedal mounting plate -Grounding / earth cable for the hub/controller Based on the number of missing items, it appears that one complete package was not included in the shipment The spacers and screws visible in some photos are my own parts and were not supplied by SIMSONN. Critical hardware issue – hub/controller defective In addition to the missing parts, there is now a serious hardware failure: The hub/controller is no longer recognized by Windows Windows reports: “USB device not recognized” The power LED starts blinking The hub heats up very quickly, even when: no pedals are connected no motors are connected only the original power supply is used Pedals and motors are no longer detected at all This issue started immediately after the firmware update. Because the hub becomes hot, I have stopped using it for safety reasons. This is not a configuration or software issue on my side. The hub/controller is currently not usable and appears to be defective. Request: Please check my order SSN4248 and arrange the following: Replacement shipment of all missing parts, including: -black spacers -mounting spacers and screws -grounding/earth cable -Replacement of the defective hub/controller (RMA) I purchased the pedals directly from SIMSONN, not via a reseller. If you need serial numbers or any additional information, please let me know. Thank you for your support. I look forward to your reply and a quick resolution. Kind regards, Jasper Diekmann Am 24.12.2025 09:47 schrieb service@simsonn.com: Hi jasper diekmann, We apologize for the delayed response. Please provide a photo so we can verify with our warehouse and arrange a replacement shipment for you as soon as possible.
